title: Haunting in the Heartland - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/21/20
itunes:title: Haunting in the Heartland - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/21/20
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and filmmaker Steve Shippy, host of the Travel Channel program "Haunting in the Heartland" explore several of the cases of hauntings and ghosts he's come across during his investigations across the Midwest.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
